entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
